name: Prisoner's Dilemma (sidwasnothere)
description:
In this prison break experience, you're tasked with retrieving a package from the warden's office without getting caught but things go wrong fast. Make your way out of the prison when it's time, but don't get killed on your way out. And get out fast.

A game by Sid Naik, Eric Yearwood, and Tomas Correa
